location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran, to Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Justin Sheil asks Samuel Hennell to provide him with the ostensible reason for Sheikh Nasir's dismissal [from the position of Governor of Bushire]. He also asks Hennell whether he thinks the dismissal is in any degree connected with the friendship that existed between Hennell and Sheikh Nasir.
